    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_4a5a9176172df4742fa39c3eae4ff87b7516461a</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Breakdown of calcium carbonate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenbruch des Kalziumkarbonats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dégradation de carbonate de calcium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Avaria do carbonato de cálcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ripartizione del carbonato di calcio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διακοπή του ανθρακικού άλατος ασβεστίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ruptura del carbonato de calcio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the breakdown of calcium carbonate to carbon dioxide and calcium oxide upon heating. This can be used as an exercise to calculate for mass of products of reactions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium oxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Zusammenbruch des 
Kalziumkarbonats zum Kohlendioxyd und zum Kalziumoxid nach Heizung. 
Dieses kann als Übung verwendet werden, um für Masse der 
Produkte von Reaktionen zu errechnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la dégradation du 
carbonate de calcium à l'anhydride carbonique et à l'oxyde de 
calcium sur le chauffage. Ceci peut être employé comme 
exercice pour calculer pour la masse des produits des réactions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a avaria do carbonato de 
cálcio ao dióxido de carbono e ao óxido de cálcio em cima do 
heating. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício calcular para a 
massa dos produtos das reações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la ripartizione del 
carbonato di calcio all'anidride carbonica ed all'ossido di calcio sul
heating. Ciò può essere usata come esercitazione per calcolare
per massa di prodotti delle reazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διακοπή του ανθρακικού
άλατος ασβεστίου στο διοξείδιο του άνθρακα και του οξειδίου 
ασβεστίου επάνω στη θέρμανση. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί ως άσκηση που υπολογίζει για τη μάζα των 
προϊόντων των αντιδράσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la ruptura del carbonato
de calcio al bióxido de carbono y al óxido de calcio sobre la 
calefacción. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio para 
calcular para la masa de productos de reacciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlendioxyd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalziumoxid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktionen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hitze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anhydride carbonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">oxyde de calcium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réactions chimiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la chaleur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">óxido de cálcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reações químicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">anidride carbonica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ossido di calcio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazioni chimiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οξείδιο ασβεστίου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημικές αντιδράσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θερμότητα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bióxido de carbono</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
